entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
